definition: A structure typically found in homes, often made of brick or stone, used for containing and directing the flow of smoke and gases produced by a fire. It is commonly used for heating purposes and can be found in living rooms or other areas of a house.

examples.german: Wir haben einen Kamin im Wohnzimmer.
examples.english: We have a fireplace in the living room.

examples.german: Ich sitze gerne vor dem Kamin.
examples.english: I like sitting in front of the fireplace.
The fireplace is made of stone.
